00105         template<typename T> void readData(T& buffer, boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket>& socket, const ConnectionHandle& handle)
00106         {
00107             if (!socket)
00108             {
00109                 throw std::runtime_error("readData: socket is NULL!");
00110             }
00111             boost::asio::async_read(*socket, boost::asio::buffer(buffer, buffer.size())
00112                                 , boost::bind(&TcpPort::OnReceiveSCP
00113                                                 , this
00114                                                 , boost::asio::placeholders::error
00115                                                 , handle));
00116         }
00117 
00125         template<typename T>
00126         void readData(T& buffer, boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket>& socket, Callback& callback)
00127         {
00128             if (!socket)
00129             {
00130                 throw std::runtime_error("readData: socket is NULL!");
00131             }
00132             boost::asio::async_read(*socket, boost::asio::buffer(buffer, buffer.size()), callback);
00133 
00134         }
